insert into t_parklot_income (incomeId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, incomes, incomeType, incaomeTime, carparkId) values (#{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incometype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{incaometime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_parklot_income set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCentificateNum = #{parkcentificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incomes = #{incomes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, incomeType = #{incometype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, incaomeTime = #{incaometime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where incomeId = #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select incomeId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, incomes, incomeType, incaomeTime, carparkId from t_parklot_income where incomeId = #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select incomeId, parklotNum, parkCentificateNum, incomes, incomeType, incaomeTime, carparkId from t_parklot_income
